synopsis.text: Haruka Nanami and the six-member idol group STARISH are back, but the journey to stardom is far from over. As they join Shining Productions and enter the master course, the group is faced with new challenges and demanding seniors. Despite their successful debut and Haruka's talent as a songwriter, STARISH must prove themselves worthy of the coveted 'Newcomer Award' to solidify their place in the entertainment industry. With their seniors reluctantly guiding them, the group must hone their skills and push their limits to achieve their dreams and truly become idols. Will they rise to the occasion and shine brighter than ever before? Join Haruka and STARISH as they embark on their toughest challenge yet.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
